~Â There is no coupon redemption. We are sorry. ~


Knowing candlestick pattern is necessary, but knowing how to trade them effectively is essential. Most traders fail to profit from candlestick analysis on account of analytical error. Understandably they do not recognize which patterns to trade and which ones to avoid. It's critical to understand the positioning of patterns.

How would you then manage to generate income from the forex, equity or any other tradable liquid market?

This course is designed to handle such situation, and that you understand the importance of correct use of candlestick analysis. This course is designed for students of all levels. The training course comprises 35 lectures and more than 2 hours of content!

In this training course, I am going to show how you can make candlestick analysis reliable and profitable. I am going to teach you how to make consistent profit trading Forex, stocks or any other tradable markets. You will learn how to recognize a high-probability and profitable trade setup than your contemporaries.

You will be able to win more trades and make greater profits. I will teach you which trades to take, when to execute, and that would incorporate the precise way to enter and exit every trade.

When you are done with this course, Mastering Candlestick Analysis, you will be able to:

  • Confidently evaluate the quality of the trade setups; automatically filter out bad trades!
  • Dexterously and effectively trade the candlestick patterns
  • Recognize low-risk high-probability opportunity, and not just take random trades
  • Ascertain Risk/Reward Ratio favourability for the trade setups
  • Know the maximum risk amount on each and every trade before entering them
title: Mastering Candlestick Charting : High Probability Trading
